text: Phir aaya aisa shaks behtar hai jiss ney apni emaarat ki bunyaad Allah say darney per aur Allah ki khushnoodi per rakhi ho ya woh shaks kay jiss ney apni emaarat ki bunyaad kissi ghaati kay kinaray per jo kay girney hi ko ho rakhi ho phir woh iss ko ley ker aatish-e-dozakh mein girr paray aur Allah Taalaa aisay zalimon ko samajh hi nahi deta
